description: New table for the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) to specify what assessed HIPPS code and reimbursement amount is versus the charge-based HIPPS code and reimbursement amount.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PPS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This category holds the data that indicates what type of data is on the row. A row can represent the pricing from the assessment or the pricing from the charges (what really happened).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


PPS / Assessment-Based


Expected Final / Charge-Based

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE
columns.description: Stores the calculated HIPPS code.  Item HAR 680 stores if it is assessment based or charge based.

columns.name: EXP_PAYMENT
columns.description: Expected payment for the associated HIPPS code. Multiple responses are permitted (one per line).

columns.name: NRS_AMOUNT
columns.description: Non routine supply amount for the associated HIPPS code. Multiple responses are permitted (one per line).

columns.name: EPISODE_RATE
columns.description: The episode rate for the associated HIPPS code.

columns.name: PAYMENT_CASE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Payment case for the associated HIPPS code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Full Episode Rate


LUPA


PEP


SCIC


No-Visit RAP

columns.name: ADD_ON_LUPA
columns.description: This item stores the Low Utilization Payment Adjustment (LUPA) add on amount.

columns.name: ADD_ON_RURAL
columns.description: This item stores the rural add on amount.

columns.name: ADD_ON_OUTLIER
columns.description: This item stores the outlier add on amount.

columns.name: LOCALE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the locale record for this row.

columns.name: LOCALE_ID_LOCALE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the locale record.

columns.name: EPISODE_TIMING_C_NAME
columns.description:
The episode timing for this Home Health PDGM account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Early


Late


Missing

columns.name: ADMIT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The admission source for this Home Health PDGM account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Community


Institutional


Missing

columns.name: CLINICAL_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The clinical group for this Home Health PDGM account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


MMTA - Other


Neuro/Stroke Rehabilitation


Wound Care


Complex Nursing Interventions


Musculoskeletal Rehabilitation


Behavioral Health


MMTA - Surgical Aftercare


MMTA - Cardiac


MMTA - Endocrine


MMTA - GI/GU


MMTA - Infectious


MMTA - Respiratory


Missing Primary Diagnosis


Questionable Encounter

columns.name: FUNCTIONAL_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The functional impairment level for this Home Health PDGM account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Low


Medium


High

columns.name: COMORBIDITY_ADJUSTMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The comorbidity adjustment for this Home Health PDGM account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Comorbidity


Low Comorbidity


High Comorbidity
